amendment.description: Amendment sought to direct the GAO to conduct a study of the means and effects of facilitating a market for all-peril insurance policies for residential properties.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 112-138 to direct the GAO to conduct a study of the means and effects of facilitating a market for all-peril insurance policies for residential properties.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 559).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Scott (VA) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 230 (Roll no. 559).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Scott (VA).
